QuestData.Title: Fathom-Lord Zin'jatar
QuestData.Description: The Fathom-Lord is here, at the far side of the ruins. He's still injured from our last battle.$B$BI'll leave this pleasure to you. Make sure he doesn't get away this time.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Suffering his first major defeat at Damplight Cavern, Fathom-Lord Zin'jatar retreated to the ruins to recover. It seems he didn't retreat quite far enough.
QuestData.CompletionText: Waiting on something? I thought you'd appreciate the opportunity to handle this yourself.$B$BDid I misjudge you?
QuestData.RewardText: And with this, hopefully their attacks on us will calm for a while.
